page.description: Expands or contracts a named category within a property grid.
page.syntax: PropertyGrid.ExpandItem( Name as C, [ Expand as L ] )

argument.name: Name
argument.decscription: The name of a category in a property grid.

page.discussion: The PropertyGrid.ExpandItem() method expands or contracts a named category within a property grid created with the Xdialog {PROPGRID} command. Note : Only the {PROPGRID} command can create the PropertyGrid object.
